reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 107, PHYS 117, PHYS 170, SCIE 001 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223.
Co-reqs: One of MATH 200, MATH 217, MATH 226, MATH 253, MATH 263.
description: Review of kinematics, Newton's laws, angular momentum and fixed axis rotation. Rigid body motion, central forces, non-inertial frames of reference. Introduction to Lagrangian and Hamiltonian mechanics.
